text:
[Verse]
I woke up late today
Nothing much to do
Just the same old groove
Feeling kinda blue

[Verse 2]
So I stepped outside
Sun is shining bright
Wavin' at the sky
But I'm still in flight

[Chorus]
Going nowhere fast
But I'm having a blast
Don't need a solid plan
I'm just a wanderin' man

[Verse 3]
City lights at night
Dancing in the street
Everything's a sight
Life can be so sweet

[Bridge]
Lost but feeling free
Just my shadow and me
No place I gotta be
Living wild and carefree

[Chorus]
Going nowhere fast
But I'm having a blast
Don't need a solid plan
I'm just a wanderin' man
title: Going Nowhere
